mapper.select: select CPU_ARCHITECTURE, AREA_NAME, AREA_ID, sum(CPU_CORE) as cpuCore, sum(MEMORY) as memory, sum(LOCAL_DISK) as localDisk, sum(SHARE_STORAGE) as cpuCore from VM_RESOURCE group by CPU_ARCHITECTURE, AREA_NAME,AREA_ID

select CPU_ARCHITECTURE, CREATE_DATE, sum(CPU_CORE) as cpuCore, sum(MEMORY) as memory, sum(LOCAL_DISK) as localDisk, sum(SHARE_STORAGE) as cpuCore from VM_RESOURCE group by CPU_ARCHITECTURE,CREATE_DATE
